alert.note: Alert for Lee; Terrell; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 1:13PM EDT until April 01 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lee County in southwestern Georgia... Northern Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 200 PM EDT. * At 113 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Americus to near Dawson, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Smithville, Warwick, Bronwood, Parrott, Chokee, Jordan Place, Yeomans, Starksville, Scrutchins, Oakville, Olivers Mill, Neyami, Philema, Mossy Dell and Oakfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
